head.title: Sunless Tan
head.description: Vitae purus faucibus ornare suspendisse sed nisi lacus sed
head.author: Natalia de la Motta

sections.title: The Formula
text: The formula we use is doctor formulated, natural looking and long lasting. It is water based, alcohol and oil free, vegan and won’t dry out your skin. This premium formula provides an even fade and won’t leave you with that sticky spray tan feeling.

The active ingredient in a spray tan is DHA. While USDA does not certify DHA as organic, this formula is made in a lab that focuses on using the fewest ingredients possible and using organic ingredients.
We carry formulas ideal from fair to warm skin tones, and have three variations that can be customized for your needs

items: Don’t wear makeup, lotion or deodorant to your appointment
Bring loose, dark clothing to allow your tan to set while keeping your clothes stain-free
Don’t shower, sweat or otherwise wet your skin for 4 hours
